name: Hekate (Hexenwerk)
description:
Please note: The game was built for Windows, so please play the downloadable windows build if you can. The WebGL is just an optional addition. About

HEKATE was created for the Yaz Solo Jam on itch.io in August 2020. It was my first solo game jam. My focus in this project was learning some scripting in Unity (C#) while using only minimalist graphics.

 
My goal this time was to create a short interactive experience. Maybe I'll update and develop this project a bit after the jam.

Language

For now the game is only available in English. If I find the time I might add a German translation.

Credits

Game Design & Development by me (Wiebke Scholz | Hexenwerk)
